channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:46 Return the threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 16:46 Return the threat of artebing to Pokrovskaya Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:42 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorivka Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 16:42 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorivka Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
